title: Make Lux use her crit animation when hitting illuminated targets!  Weekly Reminder! Redux!
body:
https://i.imgur.com/tO8O5VV.png[]
(thanks dechta for the perfect emote for the feelings im having.)

I GAVE UP ON THIS.  THEN I REALIZED THERE IS ACTUAL FUCKING PRECEDENCE!  SO I'M FREAKING BACK!

The main issue was that supposedly there was no way to know if the target shes about to hit is marked BUT!

Kai'Sa, has a special animation when autoing targets with 4 stacks of her passive.  This means Riot could actually do this and has the tech for it!  There's actual precedence!
J'accuse!

So!

Let's get right to it.

Lux should use her Crit animation when autoing targets marked with her passive, illumination.

For those of you who don't know her crit animation is her twirling her wand, it's just about never used, despite this she has a quote about twirling her wand which she almost never does.

Video of her crit.(and almost all other base skin crits if you're interested)
https://youtu.be/A35XlWYR5co?t=16m12s

replies.body:
> For those of you who don't know her crit animation is her twirling her wand, it's just about never used, despite this she has a quote about twirling her wand which she almost never does.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cifu1faEfcU
You better give me a better crit animation if you do that then.

> that fps hurts my eyes...

It was back when I was on my laptop.

{{champion:110}} My boy doesn't even have a crit animation anymore due to his W disabling it for whatever reason (bug). I can't even get Riot informed of this so that they could fix it.

But I do agree with what you are saying, I actually find Lux's Crit animation hilarious, I played Crit Lux several times because of this.

It's a wand twirl of power >.<

The only time I get to see it is in 1forall because when we go lux everyone stacks me, them I'm bursting them anyways and it's hilarious.
Maybe it's just me, but I think this crit animation looks absolutely terrible.
Well _yeah_, ever hear of [narm charm?](https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/NarmCharm)  It's great because it's terrible.

I actually didn't know this term, thanks for educating me.

Since I don't play Lux myself, I actually don't give any f*cks about this. So if this makes you happy, then why not.

More champions should use their crit animation more often.

Ahri aa'ing her charmed victim
Zoe's passive
Vel'Koz once he has his passive on someone
Zoe's passive uses a special animation already.

> Zoe's passive uses a special animation already.

Never noticed. But was just giving examples
It's a very different animation actually, she straight up does a laser attack rather than a projectile (which is actually useful as it bypasses Yasuo's Wind Wall).
Zoe's passive already uses her crit animation, which just makes me even more mad.
I don't really think lux needs that much attention right now.

> [{quoted}](name=Hvsao,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Ee0EU7nU,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-05-13T17:48:52.218+0000)

This is something that really shouldn't take much more than maybe 5 minutes of mostly copy-pasting.

And even if it does take more than that, if they have the time to shit out [this](https://twitter.com/neolexical/status/1126013666791346176), they have the time fulfill this fairly common request as well.
I mean, she's probably not really going to use it if she's just one shot comboing you most of the time.
How about nerfing her cds instead?
